nodes.bodyText: will this be efficient enough, instead of adding a find method specific for an existing link?
@scolapasta and I just discussed this and decided that we'd see how it goes in QA and optimize later if need be.
Good news, I found an alreadyLinked method and switched to it in 109a3d3.
is this test in the move tests? I see what you mean then - it works, but I wonder if we won't lose track that it's being tested here.
Tests moved to their own class in 6bccd4f.
